name: Untitled Dodge Game(UDG)
description:
Game where you have to dodge incoming  falling blocks. You have a sword that can cut wooden cubes for 1hp, metal cubes for 2hp and dragon scale cubes for 5 hp.
PowerUps: 
heart --> increases sword health
golden sword --> makes sword immune for few seconds
sword parts --> if you lose your sword, you can regain by collecting sword parts

Ultimate:
After getting 30 points you can slice boxes on the screen with finger
